verses.verse: Benjamin <WH1144> became the father <WH3205> of Bela <WH1106> his firstborn, <WH1060> Ashbel <WH788> the second, <WH8145> and Aharah <WH315> the third, <WH7992>
Nohah <WH5119> the fourth, <WH7243> and Rapha <WH7498> the fifth. <WH2549>
Bela <WH1106> had sons: <WH1121> Addar, <WH146> and Gera, <WH1617> and Abihud, <WH31>
and Abishua, <WH50> and Naaman, <WH5283> and Ahoah, <WH265>
and Gera, <WH1617> and Shephuphan, <WH8197> and Huram. <WH2361>

These are the sons <WH1121> of Ehud: <WH261> these are the heads <WH7218> of fathers <WH1>' households of the inhabitants <WH3427> of Geba, <WH1387> and they carried <WH1540> them captive to Manahath: <WH4506>
and Naaman, <WH5283> and Ahijah, <WH281> and Gera, <WH1617> he carried <WH1540> them captive: <WH3205> and he became the father of Uzza <WH5798> and Ahihud. <WH284>
Shaharaim <WH7842> became the father <WH3205> of children in the field of Moab, <WH4124> after <WH4480> he had sent them away; <WH7971> Hushim <WH2366> and Baara <WH1199> were his wives. <WH802>
He became the father <WH3205> of Hodesh <WH2321> his wife, <WH802> Jobab, <WH3103> and Zibia, <WH6644> and Mesha, <WH4331> and Malcam, <WH4445>
and Jeuz, <WH3263> and Shachia, <WH7634> and Mirmah. <WH4821> These were his sons, <WH1121> heads <WH7218> of fathers <WH1>' households.
Of Hushim <WH2366> he became the father <WH3205> of Abitub <WH36> and Elpaal. <WH508>
The sons <WH1121> of Elpaal: <WH508> Eber, <WH5677> and Misham, <WH4936> and Shemed, <WH8106> who built <WH1129> Ono <WH207> and Lod, <WH3850> with its towns; <WH1323>

and Beriah, <WH1283> and Shema, <WH8087> who <WH1992> were heads <WH7218> of fathers <WH1>' households of the inhabitants <WH3427> of Aijalon, <WH357> who put to flight <WH1272> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Gath; <WH1661>
and Ahio, <WH283> Shashak, <WH8349> and Jeremoth, <WH3406>
and Zebadiah, <WH2069> and Arad, <WH6166> and Eder, <WH5738>
and Michael, <WH4317> and Ishpah, <WH3472> and Joha, <WH3109> the sons <WH1121> of Beriah, <WH1283>
and Zebadiah, <WH2069> and Meshullam, <WH4918> and Hizki, <WH2395> and Heber, <WH2268>
and Ishmerai, <WH3461> and Izliah, <WH3152> and Jobab, <WH3103> the sons <WH1121> of Elpaal, <WH508>
and Jakim, <WH3356> and Zichri, <WH2147> and Zabdi, <WH2067>
and Elienai, <WH462> and Zillethai, <WH6769> and Eliel, <WH447>
and Adaiah, <WH5718> and Beraiah, <WH1256> and Shimrath, <WH8119> the sons <WH1121> of Shimei, <WH8096>
and Ishpan, <WH3473> and Eber, <WH5677> and Eliel, <WH447>
and Abdon, <WH5658> and Zichri, <WH2147> and Hanan, <WH2605>
and Hananiah, <WH2608> and Elam, <WH5867> and Anthothijah, <WH6070>
and Iphdeiah, <WH3301> and Penuel, <WH6439> the sons <WH1121> of Shashak, <WH8349>
and Shamsherai, <WH8125> and Shehariah, <WH7841> and Athaliah, <WH6271>
and Jaareshiah, <WH3298> and Elijah, <WH452> and Zichri, <WH2147> the sons <WH1121> of Jeroham. <WH3395>
These were heads <WH7218> of fathers <WH1>' households throughout their generations, <WH8435> chief <WH7218> men: <WH3427> these lived in Jerusalem. <WH3389>
In Gibeon <WH1391> there lived <WH3427> the father <WH1> of Gibeon, <WH1391> whose wife <WH802>'s name <WH8034> was Maacah; <WH4601>
and his firstborn <WH1060> son <WH1121> Abdon, <WH5658> and Zur, <WH6698> and Kish, <WH7027> and Baal, <WH1168> and Nadab, <WH5070>
and Gedor, <WH1446> and Ahio, <WH283> and Zecher. <WH2144>
Mikloth <WH4732> became the father <WH3205> of Shimeah. <WH8039> They also <WH637> lived <WH3427> with their brothers <WH251> in Jerusalem, <WH3389> over against their brothers. <WH5048>

Ner <WH5369> became the father <WH3205> of Kish; <WH7027> and Kish <WH7027> became the father <WH3205> of Saul; <WH7586> and Saul <WH7586> became the father <WH3205> of Jonathan, <WH3083> and Malchishua, <WH4444> and Abinadab, <WH41> and Eshbaal. <WH792>
The son <WH1121> of Jonathan <WH3083> was Merib Baal; <WH4807> and Merib Baal <WH4807> became the father <WH3205> of Micah. <WH4318>
The sons <WH1121> of Micah: <WH4318> Pithon, <WH6377> and Melech, <WH4429> and Tarea, <WH8390> and Ahaz. <WH271>

Ahaz <WH271> became the father <WH3205> of Jehoaddah; <WH3085> and Jehoaddah <WH3085> became the father <WH3205> of Alemeth, <WH5964> and Azmaveth, <WH5820> and Zimri; <WH2174> and Zimri <WH2174> became the father <WH3205> of Moza. <WH4162>
Moza <WH4162> became the father <WH3205> of Binea; <WH1150> Raphah <WH7498> was his son, <WH1121> Eleasah <WH501> his son, <WH1121> Azel <WH682> his son. <WH1121>

Azel <WH682> had six <WH8337> sons, <WH1121> whose names <WH8034> are these: <WH5840> Azrikam, Bocheru, <WH1074> and Ishmael, <WH3458> and Sheariah, <WH8187> and Obadiah, <WH5662> and Hanan. <WH2605> All these were the sons <WH1121> of Azel. <WH682>
The sons <WH1121> of Eshek <WH6232> his brother: <WH251> Ulam <WH198> his firstborn, <WH1060> Jeush <WH3266> the second, <WH8145> and Eliphelet <WH467> the third. <WH7992>

The sons <WH1121> of Ulam <WH198> were mighty <WH1368> men <WH582> of valor, <WH2428> archers, <WH1869> and had many <WH7235> sons, <WH1121> and sons <WH1121>' sons, <WH1121> one hundred <WH3967> fifty. <WH2572> All these were of the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin. <WH1144>
